intro: A dreamy adventure packed with sparkle and heart.
description:
This story follows Luna, a lavender haired girl who is transported to the magical Kingdom of Dreams to become its new Guardian. Alongside Brillin, an enthusiastic star, and Nimbo, a cat made of clouds, Luna discovers a celestial workshop where dreams are made with fantastic ingredients like laughter and colorful powders. Through festivals, magical snack times with moon rabbits, and bright carnival tours, she learns how kindness and joy keep the kingdom shining, and that the true magic of dreams is how they connect people’s hearts and turn hope into reality every morning.

An interactive storybook experience. A linear narrative adventure perfect for young readers to enjoy a captivating story at their own pace.
